product_name: Current Designs Solstice GTS Fiberglass Kayak With Rudder
long_description: Sized for small-framed paddlers and equipped with a rudder, this touring kayak has excellent acceleration, is highly efficient and can hold plenty of gear for trips big or small.
short_description: Sized for small-framed paddlers and equipped with a rudder, this touring kayak has excellent acceleration, is highly efficient and can hold plenty of gear for trips big or small.
